p: Among patients with Eating Disorders, anorexia nervosa is often complicated by immunodeficiency related to chronic malnutrition ( Allende et al., 1998), generally leading to vulnerability to infections. Teleconsulting should be encouraged for these patients in particular. A team from Singapore reported an increase in health-related anxiety in patients with Eating Disorders, related to COVID-19 ( Davis et al., 2020). The anxiety due to the pandemic may increase the patients’ difficulties to control their eating behavior ( Fernández-Aranda et al., 2020).
